entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
